name: KiVi baby
greetingText: You're the prettiest girl I've ever seen ;)
wishText: May you travel all over the world and have me by your side ;)
text1: It's your birthday baby!!! :D Welcome to the 27 club :*
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
